cn.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

cn.trackName: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验
cn.releaseNotes:
本次更新：
1.优化了赛博护士的对话体验
cn.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

cn.description:
Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine.

Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours.

Create Your Vibe:

Photos: Bring your memories to life! Use your own photos as backgrounds – Deco can even intelligently separate the subject* so your stickers tuck neatly behind (or in front of) it.
Gradients: Blend gorgeous, smooth color transitions with an easy-to-use editor and inspiring presets. Perfect for subtle or vibrant looks.
Stripes: Design chic and custom stripe patterns. You control the colors, angle, spacing, and background for endless possibilities. Presets help you get started fast.
Color: Sometimes simple is best. Pick the exact solid color that matches your mood or theme.
Image Playground: Feeling adventurous? Generate completely unique scenes using the magic of AI directly within Deco*.

Add Your Personal Touch:
Stickers: Layer on the fun! Add text, your favorite emoji, unique stickers (including Genmoji*). Place them anywhere you like – they'll look great even on different screen sizes!

Simple, Powerful, Yours:
Deco makes advanced customization easy and fun for everyone. It combines powerful features with a beautiful, intuitive interface. Deco won in the Swift Student Challenge 2025.

(Subject Separation, Image Playground, and Genmoji require compatible devices and iOS versions supporting these Apple Intelligence features.)

(iPadOS support and optional iCloud Sync planned for future updates.)

在这个全新的独家战役中将那些讨厌的海盗沉入海底！

- 畅玩 5 个新阶段：掠夺海盗王的岛屿，获取隐藏的宝藏。
- 新敌人：让海盗、海盗、鹦鹉、厚脸皮的猴子等等走上木板！
- BOSS 战斗：为 5 位“海贼王”准备炮弹，其中包括一位熟悉的面孔。
- 新英雄：认识卢塞尔纳，幽灵船船长，拥有幽灵般的力量和惊人的火力！
- 新塔：食人魔沉船，一艘由卑鄙的战争贩子指挥的失事船
- 新成就：如果没有美味的宝藏，海盗冒险还算什么？ 
- 复活节彩蛋丰富：即使在深处也有笑话！
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

战无不胜的巫师维兹南再度登场！踏上这场史诗之旅，组建军队，履行他那阴险的计划吧……哇哈哈。做好准备，让王国境内的臣民见识见识谁才是真正的老大！你将一路浴血奋战，征服新旧疆土，迎战各大帝国的劲敌，与强悍绝伦的BOSS们展开死斗——一切尽在这款充满幽默与史诗感的经典塔防游戏！

游戏特色

- 新增22种防御塔，每种都自带独一无二的特殊能力。
- 你可以随心所欲挑选防御塔，打造出最具杀伤力的组合，阻拦敌人进军的步伐！
- 42道挑战关卡，遍布三座大陆， 只等你来征服！
- 17位骁勇善战的英雄任你发号施令，绝无一丝犹豫。
- 超过60种强力敌人，让你绞尽脑汁，调动一切战术才能克敌制胜。
- 在传奇般的BOSS战中打倒7位不可一世的敌人，保卫你的王国！
- 新能力、新援军，帮你力克强敌。
- 10多种饰品和器具，让你再多几成胜算。
- 30种升级选择，让你的军队将潜力发挥得淋漓尽致。
- 60多种成就、隐藏秘密和好玩的东西等你来探索！
- 黑暗塔里没 Wi-Fi？别担心，离线玩就好！

cn.trackName: 无尽坦克大战 - 八位元单机王者 完美模拟穿越旧经典电视手游
cn.description:
经典到不能再经典的小霸王红白机坦克, 小时候发梦也在玩. 在2012年我们为了延续儿时回忆, 开发了超级坦克大战, 很多人到现在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因为我们提供了500张地图. 天天玩, 玩了多年也还未玩完.

由于游戏引擎老化问题, 我们很难在超级坦克大战的基础上加入新功能. 所以我们决定开发新的坦克大战, "无尽坦克大战", 延续经典回忆.

作为经典的延续无尽坦克大战, 包含了所有经典元素, 改良了的新特点.
保证你可以玩到下一个十年.

游戏重点:
- 防御你的基地
- 摧毁所有敌方坦克
- 加入超级坦克大战500张传奇地图

无尽坦克大战, 是个跨平台游戏, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的踪影.
游戏会不定期更新, 目标是1000张地图.

cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

灵活笔记：轻松创建、编辑和整理笔记，支持添加标签、排序和多种显示方式（单列、双列、三列）。

hk.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

hk.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

hk.trackName: 赛博神医-猜病每日挑战小测验
hk.releaseNotes:
本次更新：
1.优化了赛博护士的对话体验
hk.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断
2. 越准越快，评级越高（S级大神就是你！）
3. 从菜鸟到专家，四级难度逐步挑战
4. 解锁医生职称，从实习医生晋升到主任医师
2. 【赛博护士】
1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】
1. 当一次赛博医生，对话诊断患者疾病；
2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病
3. 计时挑战：在有限时间内完成诊断，考验反应速度和专业判断

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计
2. 多样化患者反应：不再是固定剧本，每次对话都充满惊喜
3. 进度保存：随时暂停，随时继续你的医疗生涯
4. 无需专业知识：即使零医学背景也能轻松上手

用户真实评价
"下班后的解压神器！通关的成就感比打游戏还爽！" 
"原来哄病人开心这么有技巧，学到了!" 
"医学生表示很实用，临床实习前的热身工具" 
不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

hk.description:
Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine.

Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours.

Create Your Vibe:

Photos: Bring your memories to life! Use your own photos as backgrounds – Deco can even intelligently separate the subject* so your stickers tuck neatly behind (or in front of) it.
Gradients: Blend gorgeous, smooth color transitions with an easy-to-use editor and inspiring presets. Perfect for subtle or vibrant looks.
Stripes: Design chic and custom stripe patterns. You control the colors, angle, spacing, and background for endless possibilities. Presets help you get started fast.
Color: Sometimes simple is best. Pick the exact solid color that matches your mood or theme.
Image Playground: Feeling adventurous? Generate completely unique scenes using the magic of AI directly within Deco*.

Add Your Personal Touch:
Stickers: Layer on the fun! Add text, your favorite emoji, unique stickers (including Genmoji*). Place them anywhere you like – they'll look great even on different screen sizes!

Simple, Powerful, Yours:
Deco makes advanced customization easy and fun for everyone. It combines powerful features with a beautiful, intuitive interface. Deco won in the Swift Student Challenge 2025.

(Subject Separation, Image Playground, and Genmoji require compatible devices and iOS versions supporting these Apple Intelligence features.)

(iPadOS support and optional iCloud Sync planned for future updates.)

Privacy Policy: https://docs.aethers.world/deco/privacypolicy
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

hk.trackName: 無盡坦克大戰 - 八位元單機王者 完美模擬穿越舊經典電視手遊
hk.description:
經典到不能再經典的紅白機坦克, 小時候發夢也在玩. 在2012年我們為了延續兒時回憶, 開發了超級坦克大戰, 很多人到現在也天天玩, 除了好玩外, 因為我們提供了500張地圖. 天天玩, 玩了多年也還未玩完.

由於遊戲引擎老化問題, 我們很難在超級坦克大戰的基礎上加入新功能. 所以我們決定開發新的坦克大戰, "無盡坦克大戰", 延續經典回憶. 

作為經典的延續無盡坦克大戰, 包含了所有經典元素, 改良了的新特點.
保證你可以玩到下一個十年.

遊戲重點:
- 防禦你的基地
- 摧毀所有敵方坦克
- 加入超級坦克大戰500張傳奇地圖

無盡坦克大戰, 是個跨平台遊戲, 你可以在不同平台上找到它的蹤影.
遊戲會不定期更新, 目標是1000張地圖.

hk.description:
《貪婪洞窟》全新英雄[猿神]悟空出世，獨特雙符文圖紙效果，掃平洞窟一切妖魔鬼怪。

【簡介】
《貪婪洞窟》是一款地牢探險Roguelike手游。遊戲整體畫風神秘而詭異，共有4種不同難度，400層隨機地形迷宮，60多種不同的怪物和BOSS，300多件隨機屬性的可收集裝備， 20000+字的線索式劇情。還有更多獨特有趣的玩法等你發現！

【遊戲背景】
在崇尚刀劍與魔法的彌爾頓大陸，一名冒險者在廢棄多年的礦坑中發現了大量的金子和財寶，一夜之間他收穫了從未想像的財富和名聲。
消息隨著北風迅速吹遍了整個大陸，各地的人蜂擁至此地卻又心懷鬼胎。
你，芸芸眾生中的一個普通年輕人，也帶著旁人看不透的目的，來到了這個地方……

【遊戲特色】
-探索隨機洞窟
你永遠不知道下一層洞窟會有什麼——寶藏、迷霧、陷阱、密室？還是強大首領？遊戲中充滿了不確定性，玩家只有依靠自己的計謀與膽量，才能以最小的犧牲換取最大的收穫。

-找尋捲軸 及時逃脫
逃脫捲軸是你離開洞窟唯一的物品，請務必盡快找到它！因為在洞窟內死亡後你將一無所獲——所有辛苦打怪升級的經驗、守財奴般積攢的金幣、讓你欣喜若狂的頂級寶物都將伴隨你的死亡埋葬。

-寶箱遍地也暗藏殺機
在洞窟中有許多奇珍異寶等你發現，密室寶藏更不能錯過。但是要小心那些看守寶藏的怪物，它們可是等著你上鉤呢！甚至還有偽裝成寶箱的怪物，讓你防不勝防！

-角色養成 裝備收集
在洞窟中消滅怪物能提升角色等級，合理分配屬性點與技能點將讓你更加從容面對洞窟的危險；升級、改造、附魔、點金你的裝備，以面對更具難度的探險，甚至挑戰邪惡首領，解開埋藏在洞窟的無盡秘密！

-寵物相伴 一起冒險
全新上線寵物系統，冒險之旅不再孤獨！在冒險的旅途中，你將會在不同的際遇下，遇上這些寵物。它們各具特色，也有專屬自己的獨特能力，帶上它們一起去冒險吧！

hk.description:
《貪婪洞窟》全新英雄[猿神]悟空出世，獨特雙符文圖紙效果，掃平洞窟一切妖魔鬼怪。

【簡介】
《貪婪洞窟》是一款地牢探險Roguelike手游。遊戲整體畫風神秘而詭異，共有4種不同難度，400層隨機地形迷宮，60多種不同的怪物和BOSS，300多件隨機屬性的可收集裝備， 20000+字的線索式劇情。還有更多獨特有趣的玩法等你發現！

【遊戲背景】
在崇尚刀劍與魔法的彌爾頓大陸，一名冒險者在廢棄多年的礦坑中發現了大量的金子和財寶，一夜之間他收穫了從未想像的財富和名聲。
消息隨著北風迅速吹遍了整個大陸，各地的人蜂擁至此地卻又心懷鬼胎。
你，芸芸眾生中的一個普通年輕人，也帶著旁人看不透的目的，來到了這個地方……

【遊戲特色】
-探索隨機洞窟
你永遠不知道下一層洞窟會有什麼——寶藏、迷霧、陷阱、密室？還是強大首領？遊戲中充滿了不確定性，玩家只有依靠自己的計謀與膽量，才能以最小的犧牲換取最大的收穫。

-找尋捲軸 及時逃脫
逃脫捲軸是你離開洞窟唯一的物品，請務必盡快找到它！因為在洞窟內死亡後你將一無所獲——所有辛苦打怪升級的經驗、守財奴般積攢的金幣、讓你欣喜若狂的頂級寶物都將伴隨你的死亡埋葬。

-寶箱遍地也暗藏殺機
在洞窟中有許多奇珍異寶等你發現，密室寶藏更不能錯過。但是要小心那些看守寶藏的怪物，它們可是等著你上鉤呢！甚至還有偽裝成寶箱的怪物，讓你防不勝防！

-角色養成 裝備收集
在洞窟中消滅怪物能提升角色等級，合理分配屬性點與技能點將讓你更加從容面對洞窟的危險；升級、改造、附魔、點金你的裝備，以面對更具難度的探險，甚至挑戰邪惡首領，解開埋藏在洞窟的無盡秘密！

-寵物相伴 一起冒險
全新上線寵物系統，冒險之旅不再孤獨！在冒險的旅途中，你將會在不同的際遇下，遇上這些寵物。它們各具特色，也有專屬自己的獨特能力，帶上它們一起去冒險吧！

mo.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

mo.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

mo.trackName: 王國保衛戰：起源 Kingdom Rush Origins
mo.description:
"***2015年DICE最佳行動遊戲提名***

最讓人愛不釋手的塔防遊戲，全新冒險前傳重磅回歸——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：起源》！

《王國保衛戰》系列廣受好評：iPhone, iPod touch與iPad上排名第一的戰略遊戲系列，獲得Apple編輯推薦獎、IGN編輯推薦獎、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、GameInformer金獎、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、CNET最佳iPad遊戲、CNET編輯推薦獎、Gamezebo評分4.5/5、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、Venturebeat評分94/100。

看看大家怎麼評價《王國保衛戰：起源》：

「《王國保衛戰》系列是最讚的塔防系列遊戲之一，第三部的“起源”還是那麼好玩。」——美國《娛樂周刊》 

「這些年我玩了很多塔防遊戲，但是沒有一款遊戲像《王國保衛戰》系列這樣抓住了我的心。」——The Verge 

「《王國保衛戰：起源》高清版保留了原汁原味的內容，簡直完美。」——148Apps 

「畫面精美，玩法超棒，音樂好聽，還有趣味彩蛋。喜歡塔防遊戲的玩家，一定要下載這一款遊戲。」——TUAW 

「這款讓人沉浸的塔防遊戲，能滿足你所有對新遊戲的期待：新的防禦塔、新的英雄，還有超讚的玩法。」——Kotaku 

「如果你愛好塔防遊戲，你應該熟悉《王國保衛戰》和它的續作《王國保衛戰：前線》。第三部作品現已發佈，沒錯，它就是迄今為止最讚的作品。」——Gamezebo 

《王國保衛戰：起源》是獲獎遊戲《王國保衛戰》冒險系列的第三部作品，受到數百萬玩家的喜愛，贏得全球遊戲玩家和評論的讚賞。在威之難企圖用力量寶石威脅王國之前，踏上回到起點的旅程，體驗更多快如閃電、引人入勝的玩法，一切都使這款作品成為塔防遊戲的重要基石。在這部激動人心的續作中，憑藉全新的防禦塔、英雄和法術，指揮你的精靈軍隊，守護神秘的土地，免受海蛇、邪惡巫師和一大波豺狼部落族人的侵擾，消滅全部壞蛋。

《王國保衛戰：起源》帶來有趣的新內容與功能，同時保留了眾多玩家喜愛的標誌性視覺元素。

遊戲特色 
· 重返《王國保衛戰》的世界：探訪神秘的精靈森林、神奇的仙境和古城的浮空遺跡！
· 用全新的防禦塔和部隊釋放精靈的力量！精靈弓箭手、秘法師、石環德魯伊和精靈步兵一起組成軍隊的中堅 
· 發現具有18種技能的8個新防禦塔特別升級！讓精靈射手、符文巨熊、魔法巫師和精靈巨樹為你消滅敵人。
· 拿起武器，對抗30種敵人，加入史詩級頭目戰鬥！正面抗擊成群的豺狼人、巨型蜘蛛和可怕的暮光軍隊。
· 掌控升級16個傳奇英雄和他們強大的力量與法術！
· 施出雷電，召喚援軍，用每個英雄獨特的力量去消滅大批敵人！
· 70個成就、新手與老玩家都可選擇3種難度模式，讓你沉浸在快樂的遊戲中。
· 體驗不同的遊戲模式——經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式——證明自己戰術大師的勇氣。

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.description:
這是遊戲創作者繼獲獎作品Kingdom Rush（王國保衛戰）三部曲之後的又一超凡太空奇幻歷險之作。即時，動態以及深度策略的遊戲模式將帶你穿越到不可思議的未知星球。沉浸式擬真遊戲場景，過癮的遊戲玩法，以及超凡絕佳的藝術感和一絲詼諧幽默感帶你進入激烈的戰爭世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的機甲人和強大的外星人通通等你來統率，並肩迎接最強挑戰。

招募和訓練銀河系中最偉大的英雄，率領他們參與幾乎不可能完成的危險任務，發動他們強大的力量和能力。即使是在戰鬥最激烈的時候你也可通過改變自己部隊的角色而進行戰略調整，突擊隊員調整為狙擊兵，火焰噴射器調整為導彈發射器。通過炸彈襲擊，智能地雷，支援部隊，砲塔和各種特種武器轉變戰鬥態勢。

機器人軍隊整裝待發;星際戰艦墜毀了;到處是巨大怪物，未知的種族;所向披靡的攻擊;絕望的營救;無所畏懼地破壞行動正在銀河之中發生......銀河系需要你的統領。

銀河系需要鋼鐵戰隊

遊戲特色

指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。準備好發動英勇的攻擊，堅守陣地，拯救平民，潛入超級計算機和各種英雄的物品。每個任務需要新的戰術和行動才能取得勝利。

通過17次終結式特別行動的戰術規則測試你的機智。每個關卡通過傷痕銘記挑戰。諒你也不敢。

解鎖不可能模式。僅對大無畏敢死隊開放。諒你絕對不敢。

在史詩戰鬥中擊敗巨大而非凡的頭目。這些頭目卑鄙而異常地巨大，他們決心要將你碾碎。鋼鐵戰隊，整裝待發！

40+升級以提升你的戰略，同時授予你的部隊防禦無人機，凝固汽油彈火箭，反彈爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

14位具有出色能力的英雄聽從你的調遣。將他們訓練到極致出色，否則惹惱他們後果自負。

8種可向敵人發動進攻的特種武器，讓你的戰術更加具有深度。還有什麼比得上一個瞄準了的導彈？對50枚高爆炸炸彈的軌道炮襲擊！

完成70+成就中的任何成就，贏得你應得的獎勵

選擇你的遊戲困難模式，找到屬於你的公平挑戰：休閒，普通或老兵別太狂妄了要么狂妄一點你自己決定！！

tw.description:
Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best.

ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE.
Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

tw.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

tw.description:
想尝试医生护士的日常，却没时间读医学院？
这款应用让你随时随地体验医生护士的日常生活！
医疗模拟新体验，轻松解锁白大褂技能！

1. 【速诊挑战】
1. 面对真实病例，60秒内给出诊断

1. 与难缠的患者实时对话，每次对话都是独特体验
2. 遇见各类"脾气"患者——焦虑的、生气的、怀疑的，用沟通技巧征服他们
3. 通过选择合适的回应，提升患者好感度，达95%即可通关
4. 患者情绪实时变化，你的每句话都在影响治疗结果
3. 【赛博医生】

2. 多样化病例库：每个难度对应不同疾病类型，从常见病到罕见疾病

特色功能
1. 医学情景高度还原：基于真实医疗场景设计

不需要医学背景，不需要专业知识，只要你对医疗世界有一点好奇心，这款应用就能带给你全新体验。
立即下载，今天就成为口袋里的神医！

tw.description:
《貪婪洞窟》全新英雄[猿神]悟空出世，獨特雙符文圖紙效果，掃平洞窟一切妖魔鬼怪。

【簡介】
《貪婪洞窟》是一款地牢探險Roguelike手游。遊戲整體畫風神秘而詭異，共有4種不同難度，400層隨機地形迷宮，60多種不同的怪物和BOSS，300多件隨機屬性的可收集裝備， 20000+字的線索式劇情。還有更多獨特有趣的玩法等你發現！

【遊戲背景】
在崇尚刀劍與魔法的彌爾頓大陸，一名冒險者在廢棄多年的礦坑中發現了大量的金子和財寶，一夜之間他收穫了從未想像的財富和名聲。
消息隨著北風迅速吹遍了整個大陸，各地的人蜂擁至此地卻又心懷鬼胎。
你，芸芸眾生中的一個普通年輕人，也帶著旁人看不透的目的，來到了這個地方……

【遊戲特色】
-探索隨機洞窟
你永遠不知道下一層洞窟會有什麼——寶藏、迷霧、陷阱、密室？還是強大首領？遊戲中充滿了不確定性，玩家只有依靠自己的計謀與膽量，才能以最小的犧牲換取最大的收穫。

-找尋捲軸 及時逃脫
逃脫捲軸是你離開洞窟唯一的物品，請務必盡快找到它！因為在洞窟內死亡後你將一無所獲——所有辛苦打怪升級的經驗、守財奴般積攢的金幣、讓你欣喜若狂的頂級寶物都將伴隨你的死亡埋葬。

-寶箱遍地也暗藏殺機
在洞窟中有許多奇珍異寶等你發現，密室寶藏更不能錯過。但是要小心那些看守寶藏的怪物，它們可是等著你上鉤呢！甚至還有偽裝成寶箱的怪物，讓你防不勝防！

-角色養成 裝備收集
在洞窟中消滅怪物能提升角色等級，合理分配屬性點與技能點將讓你更加從容面對洞窟的危險；升級、改造、附魔、點金你的裝備，以面對更具難度的探險，甚至挑戰邪惡首領，解開埋藏在洞窟的無盡秘密！

-寵物相伴 一起冒險
全新上線寵物系統，冒險之旅不再孤獨！在冒險的旅途中，你將會在不同的際遇下，遇上這些寵物。它們各具特色，也有專屬自己的獨特能力，帶上它們一起去冒險吧！

With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged.

FOR EVERY MUSICIAN.
Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads.

DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE.
AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space.

CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY.
AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there).


Highlighted Features:
- A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design.
- Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting).
- Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions).
- The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. 
- Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live.
- Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase.
- Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral.
- Concert pitch adjustment.


How to Use:
01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement.
02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes.
03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration.

Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

us.description:
Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. 

USERS SAY…

The best
Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it!

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP
Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!!

Fast, intuitive, user friendly
I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription.

RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE
• Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025.
• Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine.
• Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps.
• Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom.

DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS
• Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads.
• Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless.
• Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy.
• Privacy Focused: No account required.

MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world.

PROVEN SUCCESS
• Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week
• Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps

A few of the free version features:
• Easy food, exercise, and water tracking.
• Daily coaching tips and meal reminders.
• Customizable dashboard for your goals.
• iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support.
• Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos.

SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES
• Up to 108 nutrients tracked
• Plan macros
• Full set of charts
• Timestamps
• Carb tracking

If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find:

• Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback.
• Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols.
• Macros planning and cycling.
• Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos.
• Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition.
• Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings.
• In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet.

Subscription Terms:
The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

tr.description:
Earthquake Network is the most comprehensive app on earthquakes and for most world countries it is the only earthquake early warning system for receiving real time alerts.

Earthquake Network gives you:

- Real time alerts if you live close to the epicentre
- Alerts seconds in advances if you live far from the epicentre
- Real time user reports on felt earthquakes
- Free earthquake data from 21 seismic networks including U.S., Puerto Rico, India, Indonesia, Turkey, Mexico, Chile, Peru, Ecuador, Argentina, Venezuela, Dominican Republic, Colombia, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, China, New Zeland, Japan, Italy, Croatia, Spain and Greece

The Earthquake Network research project (https://www.sismo.app) aims at developing a smartphone-based earthquake early warning system able to detect earthquakes in real time and to alert the population in advance. Smartphones are able to detect earthquakes thanks to the accelerometer on-board each device. When an earthquake is detected, users with the application installed are immediatly alerted. Since earthquake waves travel at around 5 km/s it is possible to alert the population not yet reached by the damaging waves of the earthquake. For the scientific details about the project please refer to the scientific paper on Frontiers at https://bit.ly/2C8B5HI

Subscriptions:

When an earthquake is detected in real time by smartphones near the epicenter, the server sends an alert to all users with the app. Alerting all users can take up to 10 seconds since it is not technically feasible to do so instantly. Now you can join the priority lists of the first 10,000 or 100,000 people alerted in real time. The following subscriptions are available:

- Subscription 10k for 1 year
- Subscription 10k for 1 month 

- Subscription 100k for 1 year
- Subscription 100k for 1 month 

• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Privacy: https://www.sismo.app/privacy
